screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .htmod file in Hardware Tycoon Mod Tool
screenshot.caption: HTMOD file open in Hardware Tycoon Mod Tool

description: To open an HTMOD file with Hardware Tycoon follow these steps:
To open an HTMOD file with Hardware Tycoon Mod Tool, select "Load Modification." To create an HTMOD file with Hardware Tycoon Mod Tool, select "New Modification."

images.alt: Screenshot of a .htmod file in Hardware Tycoon Mod Tool
images.caption: HTMOD file open in Hardware Tycoon Mod Tool
